scripts.shared_build: tsc  && cd ./app/shared/base-handler/ && npm install ./  && cp -r ./node_modules/ ../../../built/shared/base-handler/node_modules/  && cd ./../
scripts.shared_dev: tsc && cd ./app/shared/base-handler/  && npm install ./   && cp -r ./node_modules/ ../../../built/shared/base-handler/node_modules/  && cd ./../  && serverless deploy --stage dev
scripts.shared_qa: tsc  && cd ./app/shared/base-handler/  && npm install ./   && cp -r ./node_modules/ ../../../built/shared/base-handler/node_modules/  && cd ./../  && serverless deploy --stage qa
scripts.shared_prod: tsc  && cd ./app/shared/base-handler/ && npm install ./  && cp -r ./node_modules/ ../../../built/shared/base-handler/node_modules/  && cd ./../  && serverless deploy --stage prod
